TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ViewSwitchedEventHandler(object sender, ViewSwitchedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed ViewSwitchedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub ViewSwitchedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As ViewSwitchedEventArgs)
public delegate void ViewSwitchedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, ViewSwitchedEventArgs ^ e);
type ViewSwitchedEventHandler = delegate of obj * ViewSwitchedEventArgs -> unit

Docs.param: A object that contains the event data.
Docs.summary: Represents the method that will handle the event of a form.

remarks.para: Important: The code skeleton for an event handler associated with the ViewSwitched event, which uses the ViewSwitchedEventHandler delegate, should be added only from the Microsoft InfoPath user interface. For more information on how to add event handlers in InfoPath, see How Do I: Add an Event Handler.
This type or member can be accessed from code running in forms opened in Microsoft InfoPath Filler or in a Web browser.

example.para: For an example of using the ViewSwitchedEventHandler delegate, see the sample code in the ViewSwitched event of the class.
